New Records: Sikandar Raza was named Player of the Match
Key Match Events: Brad Evans' nerve in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe won the toss and chose to bat first
Pakistan made a change in their lineup with Mohammad Wasim coming in
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Ervine praised the team's effort
Sikandar Raza credited the team and mentioned Ricky Ponting's message
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match was part of the T20 World Cup Super 12
Next matches in the tournament were mentioned
